This article is about the limestone rock. For the rock that gives elemental rocks, see Pile of Rock (elemental).

Pile of rock (also known as limestone rock) is a rock from which limestone can be mined. Three can be mined from the rock before it is depleted. Limestone is used in several skills: Mining, Crafting, and Construction. It also finds some use in several quests.

Warning: Attempting to smelt the limestone without proper glove protection will inflict 8 points of damage.

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Pile of Rock
Level required 10
Mining XP26.5 xp
Required toolPickaxe
Respawn time5.4 seconds
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Limestone1Always1216

The probability for a player to receive a limestone drop is shown for varying levels in the figure below. The rock will deplete after receiving the clay. Mining gloves and its variants do not affect pile of rock depletion.

{{Otheruses|the limestone rock|the rock that gives [[rock (elemental)|elemental rocks]]|Pile of Rock (elemental)}}
'''Pile of rock''' (also known as '''limestone rock''') is a rock from which [[limestone]] can be [[Mining|mined]]. Three can be mined from the rock before it is depleted. Limestone is used in several [[skill]]s: [[Mining]], [[Crafting]], and [[Construction]]. It also finds some use in several [[quests]].

{{Colour|red|'''Warning:'''}} Attempting to [[Smithing|smelt]] the limestone without proper glove protection will inflict 8 points of damage.

==Mining Info==

|time = 5.4 seconds
}}
